column5: Cet hôtel, malgré sa situation géographique au coeur du quartier des commerces, présente les points négatifs suivants : un coup de peinture général serait le bienvenu. Salle de bain d environ 2 m2 incluant les toilettes. Pas de bac à douche, l eau s écoulé dans un regard à moins…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded 2 weeks ago
column8: Many thanks for your review!  I had to use Google Translate as my knowlegde in French is limited. It's hard for me to be absolutely sure if your comments are actually about our hotel since we are not located in the city area and the breakfast prices do not match ours.  You are more than welcome to get in touch with me directly at Christian.weste@lundia.se, I am the General Manager for both Hotel Lundia and Hotel Finn.  Best regards Christian Weste

column5: Tillbaka på Hotell Finn efter 4 år men betyget står sig. Bodde 2 vuxna + 2 barn två nätter i en Studio L. Fungerade utmärkt till ett rimligt pris. Ett stort rum (1501) på baksidan från gatan - U format så barnens bäddsoffa skärmades av från rummets andra del. Två TV-apparater.…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 30, 2018
column8: Stort tack för din trevliga recension, även härligt att ni hittat tillbaka efter 4 år och även nu trivts. Hoppas att vi kan få välkomna er fler gånger! Önskar dig och familjen en god fortsättning och Gott Nytt År! Hälsningar, Emelie Jörgensen

column5: I've been staying in some studio rooms for several months during my working period. The rooms are sparkling clean and well equiped. They have a big terrace perfect for bbq gatherings. They also provide bikes to borrow. As location, it is about 10min walking to the city center,…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 19, 2018
column8: Thank you very much, greatly appreciated!  Best regards  Christian

column5: Rooms are clean, big, quite and the bed is very comfortable. I had a studio room with kitchen which had everithing i needed to cook inside as well.  Staff is very friendly, helpful and always positive. Hotel also has bikes for free which is a big bonus.
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 19, 2018
column8: Thank you very much for this!  Best regards  Christian

column5: Allt var automatiserat med både in- och utcheckning. Det var verkligen supersmidigt. Modern och inbjudande lobby med ljusa färger, smakfull inredning. Rent och fint på rummet. Bra läge i Lund med promenadavstånd till torget.  Ville man komma i kontakt med personalen så fanns…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 5, 2018
column8: Hej Sanna och stort tack för din trevliga recension.  Varmt välkommen åter vid nästa besök i Lund.  Med vänliga hälsningar  Christian

column4: Det här är det värsta hotell jag varit med om!
column5: Det finns ingen personal eller reception, dåligt uppmärkt vart rummen ligger, det luktar konstigt (matdoft?) i hallen och hissen luktade svett. Det krävs 3 (!) tryck på hissknapparna för att få den att röra på sig. Det var trots förfrågan hos grannhotellet oklart om man kunde…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 5, 2018
column8: Hej Maria  Beklagar att upplevelsen hos oss inte varit bra. Hotel Finn är ett huvudsakligen själv service alternativ där man checkar in och ut själv i terminaler i lobbyn. Vissa tider om dygnet finns värdar på plats för att hjälpa till med eventuella frågor. Givetvis får gäster med parkeringstillstånd för handikapplats använda densamma. Information om wifi finns i lobbyn och även i informationen placerad på rummen.  Att städningen inte varit godkänd skall vi följa upp på. Du får gärna återkomma med vilket rum du bott på respektive vilka datum bokningen var.  Beklagar återigen Med vänliga hälsningar Christian Weste christian.weste@lundia.se

column4: Stay here when you visit Malmo
column5: We stayed 2 nights in this hotel near Malmo. Check in is automated and went perfect. Rooms are clean and tidy. Breakfast is bit basic, but for this category you can't expect too much. This hotel is great when you want to visit Malmo and...for a better breakfast, just drive to…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Sep 1, 2018
column8: Dear Amit  Many thanks for your review, greatly appreciated! Best regards Christian

column5: Wij hadden een familiekamer geboekt, inclusief ontbijt. Kamer heel ruim en netjes, eigen keukentje, was erg praktisch. De kamer lag op de vijfde verdieping en dat was wel erg warm, zonder airconditioning.  Vlakbij de snelweg gelegen, niet heel veel parkeergelegenheid. Het is een…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 8, 2018
column8: Many thanks for your feedback, greatly appreciated! Best regards Christian

column5: Ett enkelt men fräscht hotell. Rummet var litet men funktionellt. Frukosten var helt ok även om utbudet var begränsat, testa ingefärsshoten.  Personalen var trevlig och hjälpsam. Om jag behöver bo över i Lund igen då väljer jag hotell Finn.
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 4, 2018
column8: Hej JP Tusen tack för vänliga ord och att du recenserat oss. Du är varmt välkommen åter. Trevlig sommar, vänliga hälsningar Christian

column5: Das Hotel liegt etwas außerhalb von Lund an einer Durchgangs-Straße. Die Zimmer sind aber überwiegend im hinteren Gebäude, so dass es sehr ruhig war. Das vollautomatische Einchecken hat problemlos funktioniert, die Menüführung am PC war sehr einfach. Unser Zimmer war sehr groß,…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 4, 2018
column8: Vielen herzlichen Dank für Ihren wunderbaren Rezension. Es freut uns natürlich das Sie den Aufenthalt bei uns geniesst haben. Wir wünschen Ihnen einen schönen Sommer und willkommen zurück beim nächsten Besuch in Lund. Mit freundlichen Grüssen Christian Weste

column4: Hôtel propre, tout est rapide et efficace
column5: De passage à Lund, j'ai eu l'occasion de séjourner à l'Hotel Finn deux fois, en janvier et février 2018. Le check-in et le check-out se fait via des bornes à l'accueil. J'ai mis moins de 2 minutes à récupérer ma clé et accéder à ma chambre. Il s'agit en fait d'un petit studio…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Informationsansvarig at Hotel FinnResponded Apr 24, 2018
column8: Merci bien monsieur, Nous sommes trés content de lire votre revue. Nous saluons le retour Avec mes meilleures salutations. Eva Persson

column5: Hotell med opersonlig reception där du förväntad checka in och ut själv. Rena fräscha rum med litet pentry. Liten frukostbuffé med det viktigaste. C:a 15-20 minuters promenad till absoluta centrum. Skramlig hiss ett stort minus.
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Mar 12, 2018
column8: Hej Cenneth, stort tack för din recension och välkommen åter! Vänliga hälsningar Christian

column5: I stood there for 2 mounth! It was so cozy and sooo nice. The rooms are amazing! Self service type hotel. Best place ever! The staff was sooo nice and friendly. They also have some bicycles that you can borrow. They have also breakfast .
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Mar 5, 2018
column8: Truly a big thank you for a wonderful review, I'm glad you enjoyed it here with us. Hope to see you back in the future again.  Best regards Christian Weste

column5: Super oplevelse! dog med et lille men..... da vi ankom kl. 16:15 var dørene låst vi fulgte anvisningen ved døren for at få hjælp men der kom ikke noget svar. En venlig gæst låst os ind, således vi kunne tjekke ind uden problemer. Det kunne være en ide med en talkode til døren…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Värdansvarig at Hotel FinnResponded Jan 2, 2018
column8: Hej Paul Erik, Tack för att du tagit dig tiden att dela med dig om ditt omdöme, är uppskattat! Tråkigt att ni inte fick något svar vid porttelefonen och absolut kunde vi har skickat en kod till dig. Men blir glad av att höra om den fina hjälpen ni fick av en annan gäst! Tack för den trevliga recensionen och hoppas att få välkomna er åter! Vänliga Hälsningar, Emelie Jörgensen

column5: Es un hotel moderno, muy limpio y cómodo. Las habitaciones son muy amplias, tienen una pequeña cocina, una sala, y un baño de buen tamaño. El personal de servicio es muy atento y el desayuno está muy bien.
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 1, 2017
column8: Thank you very much for nice Words and welcome back. Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column5: ett fräsht hotell med självbetjäntning vid in och utcheckning. bodde här 1 natt, fanns inget att klaga på men checka in sent på kvällen och checka ut tidigt på morgonen så hann inte se så mycket, men av vad jag såg så var det klart prisvärd för vad jag betalade.
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 13, 2017
column8: Tack så mycket för din trevliga recension.   Med vänliga hälsningar Christian

column5: Easy-to-use self check-in/check-out counters. Particularly large room and bathroom. Excellent beds. Very good lighting. Our room had a full pantry with fridge, microwave oven etc. Good shower cabin, but a bathroom mat would be welcome to avoid having to walk around with wet…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 8, 2017
column8: Dear Hans  Thank you for this nice review of your stay with us.  A few suggestions that we will take under consideration. You are right, parking spaces are limited and doesn't cater for all 80 rooms. However, during night time when the surrounding shops are closed those parking spaces can be used between 6 PM and 9 AM.  Hope to see you back in the near future!  Best regards Christian Weste

column5: Stayed in this hotel on and off for 18 months for work in a studio large room, the rooms themselves are spacious and have great showers and comfortable beds.    The small kitchenette is OK but lacks an oven, which gets slightly annoying over a longer stay as there's only so much…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 8, 2017
column8: Dear Jay  Thank you for your review, I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and in Lund.  Not having an oven in the rooms is mainly due to fire safety and security, the authorities won't allow it. However, we are planning for a breakfast upgrade, we aim to implement it during this fall, early winter.  Hope to see you back in Lund in the near future.  Best regards Christian Weste

column4: Smart, clean, efficient and good value
column5: My wife and I stayed for 1 night in a large, clean, stylish and comfortable room. It is an easy walk into the town centre and a wide range of restaurants. (We didn't borrow the Hotel Finn bikes, but we noticed that others did. Good to have loan umbrellas avast the door too.)…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 28, 2017
column8: Many thanks for taking the time to write this nice review.  I'm happy to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to see you back in the near future now that your son is studying at Lund University.  Best regards Christian Weste

column4: Fräscht och fint budgethotell i Lund!
column5: Ett prisvärt och fräscht hotell att bo på om man är på besök i Lund, eller på genomresa och inte vill bo i Malmö. Smidig incheckning som man sköter själv via hotellets dator om man kommer sent. Vårt rum var stort och ljust, och bonusen var den lilla köksdelen med kastruller och…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 28, 2017
column8: Hej Agneta  Tack för en trevlig recension, kul att se att ni uppskattade vårt koncept. Varmt välkomna tillbaka vid ett annat tillfälle.  Med vänliga hälsningar Christian Weste

column5: It is close to motorway and to the city center. Very comfortable bad, clean room. The breakfast was enough. Very fast check in and out. Not too many parkering place unfortunately in front of the hotel.
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Host at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 14, 2017
column8: Dear Miki B, Thank you for taking your time to share your thoughts. Glad to read that you enjoyed your stay here.  Hope to see you again. Kind Regards, Emelie Jörgensen

column5: I booked the single room whilst working in the area. The room is very basic with a single bed, TV and bathroom. There is no wardrobe space or anywhere for clothes. The bathroom has the tiniest sink I have ever seen when you try to get a wash in it the water goes all over the…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 28, 2017
column8: Many thanks for writing a review about your stay.  Most likely you booked one of our single rooms with are small in size and most suited for perhaps a stay of one or two nights and for a cost concious guest. We also have larger alternatives in Studio Medium or even Studio Large should you stay longer periods.  You mention the area as a factor, perhaps the next time you visit Lund one of our two other hotels in the city center, Hotel Lundia or Grand Hotel could be an alternative?  Best regards Christian Weste

column5: Dejligt hotel med self-check in. Værelserne er dejlig rene og der er lille køkken. Alt virker nyt og pænt. Der er hvad der skal være til morgenmad, og der er gratis kaffe 24/7. Brød og juice er kedeligt, men æg er varme og tilpas blødkogte. Lidt irriterende at folk skal checke…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Aug 28, 2017
column8: Hej Ulrik  Stort tack för en trevlig recension. Hoppas ni har njutit av semestern och ni är varmt välkomna tillbaka vid ett annat tillfälle.  Med vänlig hälsning Christian Weste

column5: Detta var vårt sista hotel på semestern och vi var ganska trötta efter en lång bilkörning så vår radar gällande hotellet var kanske inte helt påslagen.   Men rummet var helt ok, inget extra men det hade vi heller inte förväntat oss. Det är självklart rent och bra standard men…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Värd at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 19, 2017
column8: Hej Henric73, Tack för att du har tagit dig tiden att skriva om er vistelse, det uppskattar vi. Precis som du skriver så har vi alla olika förväntningar. Våra rum är neutralt och praktiskt inredda för vi vill att gäster själva ska kunna sätta sin egen prägel, då många gäster bor under en längre period. Men vi tar åt oss av vad du skriver.  Skulle ni besöka oss igen och vill sitta lite mer ostört så får man mer är gärna ta med sig frukosten till rummet.  Önskar dig och din familj en fortsatt trevlig sommar. Hälsningar, Emelie Jörgensen

column5: My husband needed to travel to Lund for a conference and this was one of the listed hotels. We had never stayed at a self-service hotel, but the reviews here helped me know what to expect. The hotel is clean; it is simple to check in and out. We didn't get the breakfast, but…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Värd at Hotel FinnResponded Jun 29, 2017
column8: Dear Georg'ann C, Thank you for taking your time to write about your stay, much appreciated. Glad that you liked it here and you are more than welcome to visit us again.  Kind Regards, Emelie Jörgensen

column5: Mycket centralt beläget hotell, nära till restauranger och livsmedelsbutiker. Passar utmärkt för dem som tänkt stanna lite längre, det finns tvättmaskin att låna, ett hyfsat bra gym och rummet har ett litet men förvånansvärt välutrustat pentry. Smart!  Inredningen är fräsch,…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Värd at Hotel FinnResponded Jun 29, 2017
column8: Hej Veronika B, Tack för att du har tagit dig tiden att skriva om oss och din vistelse. Kul att läsa dina positiva ord om rummen, möjligheterna och kaffet. Det har blivit mer vanligt för barnfamiljer att komma hit och vi håller på att kikar på lite olika saker vi skulle kunna göra för barn och deras trivsel, speciellt så vill vi göra något roligt för dem nere på vår innergård - så det håller vi tummarna för att kunna göra snart. Frukosten är tänkt att vara simpel och bara ha det mest nödvändiga. Många kan laga sin egen frukost på rummen. Nästa gång får vi se till att du får ett ljusare rum. Varmt välkommen tillbaka en annan gång. Hälsningar, Emelie Jörgensen

column5: Märkligt hotell, ingen personal större del av dagen o hela kvällen. Hänglås på kylen med alkohol, kan endast köpas när personal finns på plats, vid frukost alltså! Medioker frukost på IKEA porslin. Grab and go låter trendigt, men är en medioker frukost. Urusel bäddsoffa,…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded May 30, 2017
column8: Hej Michael  Det stämmer att vi primärt är ett självservicehotell, vi driver även de mer traditionella Hotel Lundia och Grand Hotel i Lund som kanske är bättre lämpade för dina önskemål vid nästa besök i Lund. Enligt svensk alkohollag får alkohol inte serveras innan 11.00 och därefter endast när serveringsansvarig personal finns närvarande.  Beklagar att vi inte levt upp till dina förväntningar med just denna annars omtyckta och alltmer populära produkt.  Med vänlig hälsning Christian Weste

column5: Totally misled by the opinions in here I've chosen this "Hotel"... Seriously? Can't they call it simply youth hostel perhaps because of its price?? To start with, do not come late: the advertised phone did not work and there isn't reception. I had to wait 10 min to be open by a…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded May 17, 2017
column8: Dear LaurenoF  Sorry to read about your experincies and that the stay didn't live up to your expectations. We are mainly  a self-service hotel, staff is on site normally between 6-12 and 15-21. Outside these hours Hotel Finn is monitored 24/7 by staff at our sister property Hotel Lundia. Registration is however always made at one of our two check-in terminals in the lobby.  Reading the comments maybe a more traditional hotel would suit you better the next time you visit Lund? You can find more information at Lundia.se or grandilund.se.  Best regards Christian Weste

column5: Have stayed at Hotel Finn on several occasions and always considered the hotel to be good value for money.  The hotel is very peaceful and with all necessary services and facilities in place; especially for those who are perfectly fine with "self-servicelike hotels". The rooms…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Apr 7, 2017
column8: Many thanks for the kind words and for taking the time writing a review.   Never hesitate to get in touch with our hosts should you have any questions.  And should you ever forget the entrance code there's a 24/7 intercom to get in touch with staff at our sister property Hotel Lundia.   Best regards and have a nice weekend.   Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column5: Trevligt rum och bra med ett eget kök. Fräscht och god sovkomfort. Litet gym. Frukosten var enkel men med möjlighet att ta med, vilket var bra i vårt fall. Läget är superbra om man inte ska vara i centrala Lund men bussen till centrum gick utanför hotelldörren.
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 26, 2017
column8: Hej  Tack för att du tog dig tiden att skriva om vistelsen hos oss.  Varmt välkommen vid ett annat tillfälle.  Med vänlig hälsning Christian Weste

column5: Very polite staff. They have a small but useful gym, a computer free for the guests, a free car parking just in the front of the entrance. The rooms are clean and cozy. I was here in October and back now on February and, for sure, I will stay there next time I will be around
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hostess at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 13, 2017
column8: Thank you for your review and your kind words, Giulio F. You are more then welcome back to us anytime, we are glad to have you here. See you soon again. Kind regard, Emelie Jörgensen

column5: Having now spent my 40th week at this hotel I thought I ought to review it!   Rooms: I've stopped in M, L and XL rooms all of which are good with comfortable beds, TV with Swedish and Danish channels plus BBC World, iron and a kitchen with fridge/freezer, microwave, Dolce Gusto…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Host at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 13, 2017
column8: Thank you for your review and your kind words. It is much appreciated and we are more then happy that you have been staying with us for all this time and that we will keep seeing you. I will see you soon! And Thank you again for this kind review. Kind Regards, Emelie Jörgensen

column5: We arrived late and called the person of permanence who opened the door. We then checked in "electronically" and quickly accessed our booked rooms. Great.  The next day, we discovered that the coffee/cappuccino/etc. machine was out of order and a really basic breakfast choice:…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 12, 2017
column8: Many thanks taking the time writing this review about us.  My sincere apologies about the coffee machine, our provider has been waiting for spare parts and we do hope that we will have it up and running soon again.  Best regards  Christian Weste Hotel manager

column5: The hotel is located a bit outside of downtown Lund, I estimate it is about 15 minutes walk. the rooms are nice, clean and large with a small kitchenette. Beds are all right. there is a gym that I did not use as well as a self service kitchen where you can buy soft drinks and…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hostess  at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 11, 2016
column8: Dear MartinFJ71, Thank you for taking your time to write about your stay and your kind words. You are more than welcome to stay with us again. Would like to take the opportunity to wish you a Marry Christmas! Kind regards, Emelie Jörgensen

column4: Great hotel with everything you need!
column5: I rented the studio for 5 days and it was just wonderful, I loved the design. Since this is a slef service hotel, I didn't see the staff a lot, but the ones I saw were very friendly. The breakfast was a bit repetitive, but still good. On my last night I had some problems with…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 11, 2016
column8: Thank you for the Review and my apologies for the disturbance from your neighbour, I'm glad our staff could assist you.  We hope to see you here again.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column4: Lund onder de rook van Malmo
column5: Een net hotel onder de rook van Malmo. Voor een lang verblijf geschikt en de studio zijn groot en schoon. Direct in de buurt van restaurants en verschillende mooie golfcourts die in de natuur verscholen liggen. Binnen een half uurtje bent u in het centrum van Malmo.
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 11, 2016
column8: Thank you for taking the time Writing about your stay, I'm glad you enjoyed it here.  Hope to see you soon again.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column5: Если номер будет в сторону трассы - шумно, поскольку по ней курсируют как междугородние автобусы, так и кареты скорой помощи  (или полиция) с сигналкой... Все системы автоматизированы и персонала нет, кроме девушки утром, смахивающей крошки со столиков и подающей что-либо…

column4: Decent, but not very business travel friendly.
column5: If you need a place to stay with a very flexible check in and check out logistics this is a good place because it's self-checking. That doesn't mean there's no one there to act as reception, but their availability is limited. Some things in the lobby to keep you entertained.…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 11, 2016
column8: Thank you for taking the time reviewing us. I'm sorry to hear that you stay didn't match your expectations, despite Nutella for breakfast.  I'm curious to find out which room you stayed in, just to make sure that our houseman has had a look at the electricity.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column4: Bra hotell i utkanten av Lund
column5: Trevligt och enkelt hotell i utkanten av Lund. Enkla, moderna och rena rum. Bra och trevlig personal. Hotellet har också större lägenheter som man kan hyra. Hotellet har enkel men ok frukost. Det finns ingen restaurang på hotellet men en bra pizzeria runt hörnet.
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hotellvärdinna at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 13, 2016
column8: Hej Per,  Tack för att du har tagit dig tiden att lämna ett omdöme, det uppskattar vi. Varmt välkommen fler gånger.  Med vänliga hälsningar, Emelie Jörgensen

column4: Don't clean the room between days!!
column5: Coffee machine usually broken or malfunctioning, nobody in the reception during night. If you have a problem, the only way is contacting someone outside by phone.   Poor breakfast, and far from downtown.   Some thermostats are unintentionally blocked, so you cannot change the…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, reception at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 18, 2016
column8: Dear Raul,  Thank you for taking the time and reviewing us, we appreciate that. That is true, there is no staff at the hotel during nighttime but there is always possible to get in contact with the staff if there would be any problems or doubts. The temperature is set for the whole hotel to be at a convenient temperature for our guets.  We have taken your thoughts into consideration and if you would like to book again, please ontact us directly at info@lundia.se. We have two other hotels, Hotel Lundia and Grand Hotel, they might be a better choise for your needs.  Again, thank you for taking the time and we wish to welcome you back again. Wish you the best,  Best Regards Martina Bergqvist

column5: Nos quedamos 2 noches en este hotel y nos parecio excelente! De hecho si tenian lugar queriamos cancelar nuestra estadia en Malmo y quedarnos una noche mas (son solo 15 minutos en auto).  La habiatacion era super grande (la mas completa el hotel), tenia una cocina muy bien…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Receptionist at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 18, 2016
column8: Dear Gime,  I was very glad to read your review of Hotel Finn, thank you very much for writing so many kind words about us. We really appreciate it.  I am glad to hear that you had a convenience stay and hope to see you again in the furture.   Wish you the best and welcome back to Lund and Hotel Finn.  Best Regards Martina Bergqvist

column4: Pretty good for a short stay
column5: Things we liked:  - Full sized sofa bed in our studio room for our child to sleep on. - Free laundry facilities! - Location of the property, both to the Lund central square (15 minutes walking) and to the highways in the local region. - Basic kitchen facilities in the room. -…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Receptionist at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 18, 2016
column8: Dear,  Thank you very much for writing such a nice and a accurate review about Hotel Finn, we appreciate that a lot.  I am very glad to hear that you had a convenience stay and wish to welcome you back in the furture.  Best Regards Martina Bergqvist

column4: Best place to stay in Lund!
column5: As I travel to Skåne on a regular basis, it took me a while to find the best place to stay. I have now found it: Hotel Finn in Lund. A great concept of very comfortable apartments, a nice gym, great connections both by car and public transport. My favorite place for sure!
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 2, 2016
column8: Dear Jan  Many thanks for your kind words, I'm glad to hear that you are enjoying your time with us. I'll make sure Camilla & Emelie will spread this among our colleagues.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column5: Camere pulite ed insonorizzate. Arredamenti nuovi,  staff cordialissimo e giovane. Palestra funzionale e parcheggio di fronte l'albergo senza costi aggiuntivi. Colazione abbondante a buffet. Ci tornerò sicuramente
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Receptionist at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 18, 2016
column8: Dear Giulio,  Thank you a lot for taking your time to review us, that means very much. I am happy that you liked the breakfast and that you had a nice stay.  We wish to welcome you again to Hotel Finn.  Best Regards Martina Bergqvist

column5: Das Finn ist von außen eher nicht gleich als Hotel zu erkennen, da es in Bürogebäude eingebettet ist. Self Check-In war kein Problem. Wir hatten ein Zimmer im hinteren Teil des Komplexes. Sehr sauber, modern, sehr geräumig mit kleiner Küchenzeile und ruhig. Das Frühstück war gut…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Receptionist at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 18, 2016
column8: Dear,  Thank you a lot for taking time and writing a very nice review for Hotel Finn. That mean a lot to us. I am happy to hear that you liked the breakfast, we are very satisfied with it.  We wish to welcome you to us again.  Best Regards Martina Bergqvist

column5: This is our second stay at Hotel Finn of a week or more.  Many of our friend who visited when we lived here stayed here as well.   Obviously it was good enough to return but it seems things are moving in the wrong direction.  First, the location is great if you want to be in…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 2, 2016
column8: First and foremost, thank you for taking the time writing about your experiences. My apologies for not living up to your expectations this time around. I would very much like to get in touch with you personally and you are most welcome to contact me at christian.weste@lundia.se  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column5: Ici, personne pour vous accueillir, vous servir, vous indiquez quoi que ce soit. Comme dit dans un précédent commentaire, vous entrez dans l'hôtel, vous vous retrouvez face à des bornes électroniques qui vous donnent votre carte d'hôtel. Vous vous débrouillez pour trouver votre…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Receptionist at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 18, 2016
column8: Dear Cholé,  Thank you for taking time and reviewing Hotel Finn, that means a lot to us. I am glad that the check in and check out went well for you, as you wrote, it is a self-service check-in machine but there is always possible to get help if there would be any doubts or problem.  Again, thank you and we wish to welcome you again to Hotel Finn. Wish you a nice day.  Best Regards Martina Bergqvist

column4: Sämre än förväntat men helt ok
column5: Hade läst rekommendationer innan jag bokade på Finn men blev besviken när jag kom in i rummet. Hotellet är helt okej och ligger ganska nära centrum. Jag är dock besviken på rummet. Jag bokade ett enkelrum då jag skulle bo själv. Hamnade längst ned (under gatuplan) med ingen…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 2, 2016
column8: Hej Lovisa  Tack för din recension och jag beklagar att din vistelse inte levt upp till dina förväntningar. Du har troligen bott i våra minsta och mest prisvärda enkelrum. Vi har även andra alternativ, dels större rum med mer utrustning bättre avsedda för lite längre vistelser. Dina synpunkter och förslag har jag tagit till mig, tack för att du tagit dig tiden att dela med dig.  Med vänliga hälsningar Christian Weste Hotelchef

column5: Nous avons passé une nuit en famille (2 adultes + 2 ados) dans cet hôtel. Notre chambre ("studio XL") était grande, lumineuse et très bien équipée. Le centre ville est assez proche, il y a un supermarché pas loin et on peut cuisiner dans la chambre (cuisine petite mais très bien…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Receptionist at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 18, 2016
column8: Dear Delphine,  Thank you very much for reviewing Hotel Finn. We are very glad that you liked our Studio XL, they are nice and spacious.   We wish to welcome you to Hotel Finn again if you will visit Lund again.  Best Regards Martina Bergqvist

column5: Bij aankomst bleek inderdaad dat het inchecken self-service was, wat overigens heel makkelijk was. Onze kamer (studio) voor 2 personen was heel erg ruim en had naast de standaard badkamer en het bed ook een aantal kasten, strijkplank, keuken en koffiezetapparaat. Om deze reden…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Receptionist at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 18, 2016
column8: Dear Timnij,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write such a nice review of Hotel Finn. We appreciate that a lot. We hope to welcome you back to Hotel Finn another time.  Best regards Martina Bergqvist

column5: We stayed one night at this hotel. The room was very modern with an excellent finish to the decor. It was more of a Studio as it had a fridge, small cooker and a coffee maker. No bath but a very good shower. The bed was good and we had a good night's sleep. Internet was good and…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Receptionist at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 18, 2016
column8: Dear Plopitucus,  Thank you for taking your time and review us, we appreciate that very much. We are so glad that you pointed out the very good things at Hotel Finn.  We wish to welcome you again to the hotel.  Best Regards Martina Bergqvist

column5: Очень современный отель! Шикарные номера со всеми удобствами,включая мини кухню. Соотношение цена/удобства-впечатляет! Неплохой завтрак.Да и вообще обрадовало всё, учитывая,что это гостиница без персонала.Единственное: рядом, в шаговой доступности, не нашли продуктовый…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Receptionist at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 30, 2016
column8: Dear,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about Hotel Finn, we are very glad that you enjoyed your stay and wish to welcome you back to us. Thank you.  Best wishes, Martina Bergqvist

column5: Das Finn Hotel ist ein von außen eher unscheinbares Hotel, das durch durchdachte Details und Geräumigkeit punkten kann. Die Doppelzimmer sind ca. 20m² groß, das Bad mit eingerechnet. Die Betten sind okay, es gibt eine moderne Küchenzeile, ein Bad mit ebenerdiger Dusche und…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Oct 2, 2016
column8: Vielen herzlichen Dank für Ihren Bericht. Wir hoffen dass Sie uns bald wieder besuchen werden. Mit freundlichen Grüssen Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column5: Lätt att köra dit. Parkera gratis. Smidig automatiskt incheckning  Rent och fräscht. Stort rum. Liten dubbelsäng för två personer, så jag låg på golvet. Bara en uppsättning handukar men det fixades snabbt när jag sa till. Bra med fruki5man kan ta med.
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Receptionist at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 19, 2016
column8: Hej Sharmantah, Tack så mycket för att du tog dig tid att lämna omdöme för Hotel Finn, vi uppskattar det mycket. Även tack för de fina orden och hoppas att er upplevelse i Lund var till er belåtelse. Vi beklagar upplevelsen med sängen, vi har olika sorters dubbelrum med olika storlekar på sängarna och önskar ni boka igen är jag säker på att vi kan hitta det som passar er bäst. Hjärtligt välkomna till oss igen.  Med Vänliga Hälsningar Martina Bergqvist

column5: hotellet på sidan om,men nära att gå in till stan där det finns fina restauranger och gångvägar.det stora pusset är den lugna placeringen att man även vågar parkera en dyr bil.inge restaurang,frukosten...men det finns småplock så det räcker
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column8: Hej och tack för trevliga ord om oss. Varmt välkommen tillbaka vid ett annat tillfälle.  Med vänliga hälsningar Christian Weste Hotelchef

column5: It was a bit surprised after entering the hotel for the first time to have no reception only some monitors where I was able to check in. It was very simple to do and was also surprisingly quick.  The rooms did were a nice size with the little kitchen and the table. The bed was…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column8: Dear Critical Duck  I enjoyed reading your review since it's very spot on to what features this mainly self-service hotel has or hasn't. However, we have staff on site every morning up until noon and most evenings between 3PM and 9PM. Outside those hours you can always get in touch with staff at one of our other properties in Lund 24 hours. When it comes to the cleaning you may alert our staff and we'll see to your request. Also due to us being a self-service hotel we provide a lighter breakfast which recently during June was updated, this mainly due to guest feedback and we think it will suit future guests even better. The next time you visit Lund you might perhaps consider our other hotels, have a look at our websites www.lundia.se or www.grandilundia.se to find out more. Should you deside to stay at Hotel Finn again, don't hesitate to contact me beforehand at christian.weste@lundia.se and I'll make sure that we take good care of you.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column5: If you are after convenience and cleanliness, then Hotel Finn is a good place to stay. If you like dealing with a real person at reception and a bedroom with a bit of character, then find somewhere else (My room was basic and didn't have a kitchenette/drink making facilities). …

Very nice rooms with a small kitchen and fridge(!) I love that it feels like a small apartment and I can cook my own meals. Small gym if you feel like working out. Nice lounge area. Nice staff. Free parking and wifi. I will be coming back!  Only the breakfast was a little under…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column8: Dear Mikael  Thank you for writing this review, I'm glad to see that you enjoyed your stay. Yes, since we are mainly a self-service hotel, the breakfast is a little different from a more traditional hotel. However, we have recently made a few changes which we think will improve the guest experience.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column5: Vorab: Zugang gibts nur mit zugesandter Codenummer oder Nr. der buchenden Kreditkarte. Oder man wartet bis jemand kommt, also ein anderer Gast. Hotel hat eine automatisierte Rezeption zum Einchecken. Personal ist nur morgens beim Frühstück anwesend, dann aber gleich zwei Leute.…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column8: Sehr geherter Hr Hartwig.  Vielen Dank für die Bewertung über uns.  Beim einchecken gibt es am Eingang ein Intercom, da kommt man in Verbindung mit Personal am Hotel Lundia und die können die Türe aufmachen.  Personal sind jeden Morgen bei der Arbeit bis 12 Uhr. Abends vom 15 bis 20 oder 21 Uhr wieder, Änderungen oder andere Zeiten können vorkommen. Den Frühstück wurde in die letzten paar Wochen etwas umgeändert und verbessert, es gab nämlich auch andere Gäste die sich die Wahlmöglicheit wünschten. Es freut mich das Sie ingesamt einen guten Aufenthalt gehabt haben.  Mit freundlichen Grüssen Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column4: Really nice rooms for a good price!
column5: The rooms have a lot of space, really fresh and new rooms, bathrooms and they also have a kitchen where you can cook your own food.  Really nice hotel room that is not very expensive. Probably because the hotel is a self check in hotel, but it went really smooth and if you have…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column8: Dear Nina  Many thanks for nice words, I'm glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Welcome back in the near future.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column5: We arrived around 20:00 and when we arrived there was noone at the reception and an old couple staying there opened the door for us. It is almost a no staff hotel and you have to figure it out how to check-in, but they make it quite easy with thorough explanations. They have…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column8: Dear Erdem  Many thanks for taking the time writing a review. Yes, we are mainly a self-service hotel and hosts are available every AM and with few exceptions most evenings also. You can always get in touch with staff at one of our sister properties by unsing the house phone in the lobby, available 24/7.  Swedish laws regarding alcohol prevents guests from self service in public areas.  We hope to see you here again in the near future. Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column5: Had to stay & found this place on a short notice. Very friendly place with freedom & all necessary facilities.I would recommend to all.Accommodation is nice & spacious with in house mini kitchen for self catering. 24 hour breakfast facility is special though you have to pay for…
column6: Response from Hotel_Lundia, Hotelldirektör at Hotel FinnResponded Jul 6, 2016
column8: Many thanks for your review, I'm glad you enjoyed your stay. Hope to see you back here in the future.  Best regards Christian Weste Hotel Manager

column5: Ho soggiornato in questo albergo per una notte, durante l'ultimo viaggio a Lund. C'è la possibilità di fare il check in e check out in autonomia. La stanza è confortevole e colorata, un piccolo monolocale con cucina. Il personale è molto gentile. Scarseggia nelle proposte per la…

Om man kan tänka sig en kvarts promenad in till centrum så är Hotell Finn ett utmärkt alternativ med gratis parkering precis utanför porten.Vi fick ett stort rum på markplan med pentry och sittgrupp. Rymligt och fräscht. Extra plus för varma croissanter till frukost.
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hotellvärd at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 25, 2016
column8: Hej Annika D, Tack för du tagit dig tid att skriva om er vistelse hos oss.  Härligt att ni fick ett rum som ni trivdes i och att croissanterna var uppskattade. Hoppas ni kommer och besöker oss igen. Önskar dig en trevlig dag! Med Vänliga Hälsningar, Emelie Jörgensen

column5: Städningen var inte helt 100 i badrummet, och toaborsten bada i vatten. Annars fick jag ett bra intryck, fräscht och trevlig personal, med små medel hade receptionsområdet kunnat gjorts lite mysigare...(roligare belysning) Frukosten var bra trots mycket engångsförpackningar,…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hotellvärd at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 10, 2016
column8: Hej, Tack för att du tagit dig tiden att skriva en recension till oss och för att du valt att bo hos oss.  Städningen av toaletten har tagits upp med städarna och det har setts över.  Tack för tipset om lite roligare belysning, ska ta en titt på ljussättningen och se vad vi kan göra för att göra det mysigare. Än en gång, tack för att du tagit dig tiden, det uppskattas och gör det lättare för oss att utvecklas till det bättre.  Med Vänliga Hälsning, Emelie Jörgensen, Hotellvärd

column5: Simple self-service check-in, and large clean family room with modern design and kitchenette. Great lobby area and self-service pay-as-you-take snack.  Breakfast a little chaotic, due small serving area and morning rush.  Overall good value for money.

Havde 2 overnatninger på Hotel Finn. Man skal lige være forberedt på at al ind- og udcheckning foregår elektronisk og uden betjening. Værelset var fint og rummeligt og med et godt stort badeværelse. Man kan gratis låne cykler på hotellet eller gå de 15 minutter ind til centrum.…

This hotel suits you who want's a clean, modern and quiet place to sleep at. You check-in by yourself at a touch screen computer which then spits out a key card.   I've only stayed in single rooms, which are small but fills it's function, nice beds and very fresh WC/shower.  The…

column4: A great place for a long term stay
column5: We stayed for about two weeks in a suite - bed, bath, kitchenette, sitting area.  The bed was comfortable, the bathroom larger than European norm, and the kitchenette had just enough to get by.    Two highlights: one was the table on wheels in the suite with two chairs allowed…

The good side of this hotel is the location: ten minutes walking from the city center. All the rest is nothing special, my room was big but there was no writing table nor garderobe, and I was located in the basement, so it was really dark. Breakfast was included, but the free…

Great hotel with all you need. Clean, great beds, WiFi that works and simple but good breakfast. Free parking right in front of the door. Small gym and spa/sauna in the basement that you can use for free. They have bikes as well if you want to take a ride into town.

We travelled by car, two adults and a teenager. Parking was no problem, and the hotel was close to the highway. Reception is self service, which was no problem at all. The hotel seemed to be brand new, clean and high standard of reception area, stairways as well as rooms, beds…

The hotel location is right on the highway with parking facilty. The room was clean and ambience was great! I loved it, the kitchenette, bathroom were so user friendly and comfortable. The bed was cosy and inviting......i would surely go there again......

Been there for one night. High profile self-servisse hotel. Structure and place are OK. Good facilities in the room and high finish quality. Not so many places to park around the hotel, so it´s reccomendable to take car of it.

A very good self-service hotel. Clean rooms, free parking and Wi-Fi, within walking distance to the town centre (10-15 mins), convenient price. Good breakfast, you can take 5 items and you can eat them there or take them as "breakfast to go". Excellent hotel for one night stay.

Vi anlände ganska sent och den automatiska incheckningen var väldigt smidig! Dock gick det inte att låna cyklar på kvällen då personalen inte fanns på plats.   Rummet var väldigt fräscht och tillhörande kök var välutrustat (induktionshäll, rivjärn, flera kastruller, porslin,…

column4: Rimelig hotell med en del mangler.
column5: Jeg var på Hotel Finn i 5 dager i begynnelsen av juli 2015 sammen med 2 kamerater. Vi hadde sett mange positive omtaler av dette hotellet på nettet, og dette skapte litt forventninger. Dessverre kan jeg ikke si at alle forventningene ble oppfylt, og jeg kommer tilbake til…

Situated a walking distance from the centre (at least if you have no luggage), the hotel offers cheap accommodation. The satellite rooms are small but comfortable and quiet. The breakfast has limited offering, but everything was tasty and fresh. The only problem was entering the…

column4: Good hotel. Be prepared for automatic check-in!
column5: I chose this hotel mainly since I needed a kitchenette as I stayed for an entire week. The room is large, comfortable and the kitchen is perfect for displaying the needs of a long stay. It's a bit outside the old city center, but easy to get by foot (15 min walk or by bike (only…

Trevligt och fint hotell, Fina rum och sköna sängar!, utmärkt att man har ett eget kök på rummet, Lite ovant att stå och prata med en låda när man vill bli incheckade vid dörren men otroligt smart, det man kan sakna är avsaknaden av personal vi bodde där i 3dagar och såg aldrig…

Bra service, personalen är serviceinriktad, lugnt och skönt, rent och snyggt, hög standard. Lätt att ta sig till hotellet, och bra prisnivå. Att det finns ett litet gym att träna i gillade jag mycket.
column6: Response from Jasmina S, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 18, 2015
column8: Tack 1959Anders för ditt inlägg! Det uppskattas! Du är varmt välkommen tillbaka!

column5: Rummen är stora med soffa och trägolv, fräscha och billiga (hotels.com 536kr). Positivt är att det finns kylskåp och liten köksdel med micro och vattenkokare och spis. Platt-tv vid fotändan-smart. Enda negativa var den opersonliga check-in-datorn.
column6: Response from Jasmina S, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Feb 10, 2015
column8: Hej olabandoola!  Tack för din fina recension! Det uppskattar jag! Personal finns för det mesta under dagtid dock är det obemannat under natten. Du kan alltid lyfta på luren vid incheckningsdatorerna om du har några frågor eller funderingar. Du är hjärtligt välkommen tillbaka!  Med vänliga hälsningar Jasmina

column4: Clean, modern hotel with cooking facilities in the rooms
column5: This is a semi-automated hotel about a 15 minute walk from the train station in Lund (or take the #3 bus, which runs every 10 minutes or so - it brings you right to the hotel).  You can check in just by scanning your passport and credit card, and you don't have to interact with…
column6: Response from Jasmina S, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Jan 16, 2015
column8: Dear altaskier_ny,  Thank you for your review! I´m glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Thant's a great sum up of Hotel Finn! Hope to see you soon aging  Best regards Jasmina

column4: Rent, modernt och prisvärt för familjen.
column5: Bodde 2 vuxna + 2 barn två nätter i en Studio L. Fungerade utmärkt till ett rimligt pris. Ett stort rum på baksidan från gatan (=tyst). Nytt och fräscht och välstädat överallt. Hemsidan beskriver hotellet på ett tydligt och ärligt sätt.  Frukosten är enkel men funkar,…
column6: Response from Jasmina S, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Jan 5, 2015
column8: Kära TobbeO  Tack för ditt fina inlägg! Det uppskattas verkligen! Ni är hjärtligt välkomna tillbacka och då kan vi självklart ordna fler stolar till er.  Med vänliga hälsningar Jasmina

column5: This hotel was booked by my work. I was not aware that the hotel is rarely staffed, and showed up at 12:45pm to drop off my luggage. I rung the doorbell, knocked for a long time. I was completely stranded and had to desperately use the toilet. If it was not for the beautiful…
column6: Response from Jasmina S, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 10, 2014
column8: Dear Grace C,  Thank you for your review!  I'm so sorry to hear that you are not completely satisfied with your stay.  You should have received a SMS with your personal pin code for the entrance the morning of you arrival.   We are staffed Monday- Friday from 7.00 am to 21.00 pm with exception a few hours between lunch and check in time. On Saturday and Sunday we are staffed from 8.00 -12.30. Our sister Hotel is glad to help you during all other time, again I´m very sorry if there has been some technical problems with the door bell during your arrival.  I hope the rest of your stay was pleasant and that you will come back soon again! If you have any other questions please don't hesitate to contact me.   Best regards Jasmina

column5: If you travel a lot you'll love this place. All bits you need are good - clean modern room with a decent TV and fast, free WIFI. No fuss breakfast. And a refeshing 15 minute stroll to the centre of Lund... or borrow a bike!  I like htis place and intent to make it my hotel of…
column6: Response from Jasmina S, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 5, 2014
column8: Dear SteveGas,  Thank you for a good review, I appreciate it. I'm glad that you liked Hotel Finn so much!   Hope to see you soon again  Best regards, Jasmina

column5: 3 night stay.  Bus stops outside the front door.  Easy self check in/out.  Clean, spacious, modern rooms - nice bathrooms.  Our room included a small stove, fridge, microwave & cups, plates etc.  Be prepared to provide for yourself as there isn't cafés/restaurants in the hotel.…
column6: Response from Jasmina S, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 21, 2014
column8: Dear ImOrr,  Thank you for your lovely words!  Hope to see you soon!  Best regards Jasmina

column5: Один из самых лучших отелей европейского уровня! Электронная стойка регистрации с удобным сервисом и голосовыми инструкциями. Просторный холл с камином, разнообразные завтраки. Номер просторный, оформленный в лучших традициях скандинавского минимализма, при этом полностью…

I travel to Lund on a regular basis and ALWAYS stay at this place. Love the concept, the nice spacious rooms, the gym (small but functional) and the location. I can warmly recommend this hotel to others.
column6: Response from Jasmina S, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 11, 2014
column8: Dear Jan B  Thank you for your kind words! See you soon   Best regards, Jasmina

column5: Hotel Finn is far from being my favoured option in Lund.  The hotel is staffed only during certain hours, so when I arrived to find only one pillow in my room there was no one available to ask for an extra one (perhaps there was a number I could have called but I didn't feel…
column6: Response from Emelie C, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 4, 2014
column8: Dear funkylittlefrog,  Thank you for your feedback! I appreciate it! In our singe rooms we only have one pillow and when your host isn´t present you can always call our sister hotel, Hotel Lundia, via the phone on the check in counter. Do you remember which room number you had?  You can always ask your host to prepare a baguette without ham.   We also have larger Studios with a bigger bed and more pillows. The price difference is about 100-150 SEK. Hope to see you again!  Best regards Jasmina

column5: Stayed here for two nights, got a good price for a late booking so i thought it was a good choice compared to that price, with the original price i might have giving it a 3/5.  Anyway, good clean rooms, the whole hotel is run with the idée that staff should have as little as…
column6: Response from Emelie C, Försäljningschef at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 4, 2014
column8: Dear TozCaz,  Thank you for your feedback! I appreciate it! I will forward the feedback to the guy that answered.  Hope to see you soon again!  Best regards Jasmina

column5: Pour un tarif acceptable, l'hôtel se trouve à proximité du centre-ville (10mn à pied en ligne droite). L'intégralité du séjour peut se faire sans avoir le moindre contact humain avec qui que ce soit pour peu qu'on ait l'habitude. On arrive à la porte, on ouvre avec le code de la…

This is a modern/stylish hotel with no front desk/reception. The check-in and check-out are self -service (see photo), so bear in mind this is perhaps not for everyone? It is a nice 10mn walk from the city center but you can also take the bus which stops just outside the hotel,…
column6: Response from Emelie C, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 4, 2014
column8: Kära JanMD73,  Tack för ditt fina omdöme! Det uppskattas verkligen! Vilken fin beskrivning av vårt hotel.  Hoppas vi ses snart igen  Med vänliga hälsningar Jasmina

column5: We (my wife and I) stayed at this hotel for one night. Our room was really nice: modern, clean, and big. The bathroom was very nice as well. The only problem we had (which turned out to be quite difficult) was that the room was very warm, which made it very difficult to sleep at…
column6: Response from Emelie C, Receptionschef at Hotel FinnResponded Nov 4, 2014
column8: Hej swedentraveler2000 ,  Tack för ditt omdöme! Det uppskattas! Kul att ni trivdes hos oss. Jag misstänker att golvvärmen I badrummet har varit igång, det kan bli ganska varmt av den. Be gärna er värd om hjälp så ni kan sova gott!  Hoppas vi ses snart igen!  Med vänliga hälsningar Jasmina

column5: Hamnade av slump där och mycket överraskad blev jag när jag klev in i rummet som var till väldigt rimligt pris. Enkelt & smidigt att checka in och ut. Kvalitet behöver inte kosta extra och så är det på Finn.
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hostess at Hotel FinnResponded Jun 13, 2014
column8: Hej Homayon A,   Tack för din recension om Hotel Finn. Vad roligt att höra att du hade en bra upplevelse hos oss, det gör oss glada!  Vi hoppas att se dig snart igen.   Vänliga hälsningar, Din värd Johanna

column4: Decent hotel, good customer service, but concept is definitely not for every one
column5: first off, we are a young couple from California and we were soo disappointed in the location of this hotel. We should have read the website better but it is farrr from town and the train station, and nobody in town has ever heard of it (making it difficult to get back!).  I'm…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Front Office Manager at Hotel FinnResponded May 30, 2014
column8: Dear Mana!  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about Hotel Finn on Tripadvisor, we appreciate it a lot! I would like to make some comments regarding your review:  - Like you say, our concept might not be for everyone. Hotel Finn is - like we are clear about on all booking channels - a self service hotel. This suits travellers that don't need traditional hotel services and instead like a more relaxed atmosphere. That's why we for example have made the lobby area into Finn's Livingroom where your can come hang out, play Wii and Foosball, eat a meal, etc.   - It takes about 15 minutes to walk into the centre of Lund and a lot of people appreciate our location because of the convenience of being close to the high way as well as public transportation. I know that you got assistance how to take the bus as well as taxi from our sister hotel in the centre but you decided to walk.   - Since the room you stayed in is an apartments, and a lot of our guests prefer to make their own meals in the room, we have decided to have a lower price and make breakfast optional. This is for the convenience of the guest so that you don't have to pay for anything that you won't use. I would also like to mention that you and your partner received a complementary breakfast.   - In my experience the rooms are not hard to find - or at least I haven't had a complaint about it before since there are signs toward all rooms all the way from the lobby until you are in the correct floor.   - Although we are a self service hotel we do have staff here both in the morning as well as afternoon and night time on weekdays. On Saturdays and Sunday we are here for at least 5 hours each day. If there is a problem or if you have any questions when we are not present there is a phone in the lobby which you simply lift to get assistance 24/7. A phone I know that you used while you were here.   Thank you again and enjoy you day! For another visit to Lund I would recommend our sister hotels Lundia or Grand Hotel where you get a more traditional experience in the centre of the city.   Kind regards, your host Emelie

column5: Hotellet ligger tæt på motorvejen og er nemt at finde. Fik dejligt stort og lyst værelse. Der er selv check in og out. Værelset havde the køkken og køleskab. Alt var pænt og rent.  Kan anbefales hvis Malmø hotellerne er fuldt booked.
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Front Office Manager at Hotel FinnResponded May 28, 2014
column8: Hej Claus A!  Tack för att du tog dig tid att skriva om Hotel Finn, det uppskattar vi mycket!  Med vänliga hälsningar, Din värd Emelie

column5: Booking was automatic and so was in-checking. It is a short walk from the city center, very easy to find if you arrive by car, it is only 200m from the freeway off-ramp. The room was well equipped.    The bed sheets did smell like they hadn't been properly washed, especially the…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Front Office Manager at Hotel FinnResponded May 28, 2014
column8: Thank you for taking the time to evaluate us on Tripadvisor, we appriciate it a lot!  I am sorry to hear that you weren't satisfied with your linen - these are ofcourse changed and washed after every guest.   Incase you have any problem like this in the future - please tell us right away so that we can adjust it for you while you are here.   Thank you again! Kind regards,  Your host Emelie

column4: Minimalistic yet cosy, great hotel in a lovely city
column5: My partner and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Hotel Finn in Lund - the self check-in system and self-service shop made for a very interesting experience, and made us feel as though we were in complete control of our stay. Large room (we stayed in a 'Studio M' room, which was…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Guest Relations Manager at Hotel FinnResponded Apr 25, 2014
column8: Dear Sarah!  Thank you for your kind words and for taking the time to review our hotel. It means a lot!  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience. Regarding the curtains - the thicker ones are for you to pull if you want the room darker. We are glad to show you the next time you visit.   Thanks again and welcome back!  Kind regards,  Emelie - Your hostess

column5: I spend a month at the Finn Hotel, in a Studio M room. Everything was very new and there are a lot of utensils available, from kitchenware to hair drier or iron. Special mention for the small but perfectly functional gym and washing room. Oh, and the Wii downstairs ;)
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hostess at Hotel FinnResponded Jan 10, 2014
column8: Dear inigoalonsocom,  I am so glad you enjoyed your stay and I appreciate you taking the time to review Hotel Finn. Your caption “Home away from home” is exactly what we want our guests to feel. It means a lot.  Best regards, Johanna Nyström Hostess

column5: It was wonderful experience to stay in Hotel Finn , i have stayed there twice , both of them longer durations  during june , july  , august and stayed for more than a month .. Very good hotel, very much safe for the family ... I was very happy with the stay,  both Philip and…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hostess at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 30, 2013
column8: Dear vinod5380,  Thank you so much for your review and for your kind words about Hotel Finn and the staff, it means a lot to us. We hope to see you soon again!    Best regards, Johanna Nyström Hostess

column5: super hotel...petit mais bien equipé, salle de sport au rez de chaussée, lounge sympa avec ordinateur, tv, console de jeux, etc...a 5minutes de la ville. chambre équipée d'une petite cuisine bien pratique, avec de la vaisselle tv qui accepte les clés USB...salle de bain sympa et…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hostess at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 16, 2013
column8: Dear alainp1974,  Thank you so much for your kind words about Hotel Finn. We sincerely hope to see you back soon again!   Best regards, Johanna Nyström Hostess

column5: Nice hotel, however the rooms are very small and not with the highest standard of cleanness.  My room had just a window facing a wall (it was in the basement!) Very poor breakfast: limited choices, low quality food and coffee
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hostess at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 6, 2013
column8: Dear Ste9786 - Thank you for your review. The majority of rooms at Hotel Finn are quite large studios. I hope that you will return to our hotel for a longer stay and I would then be delighted to upgrade you to a studio room.  Kind regards, Johanna Nyström Hostess johanna.nystrom@hotelfinn.se

column5: The hotel is located in the outskirt of Lund around 20 minutes on foot from the station or 5 minutes with traxi or public transportation. The hotel has a self service check in and self service check out. Rooms are cleaned only every 5 days and have also a small kitchen. They are…
column6: Response from Staff_HotelFinn, Hostess at Hotel FinnResponded Dec 6, 2013
column8: Dear Stone651128 -  Thank you for reviewing Hotel Finn - I am happy you enjoyed our facilities. We constantly try to improve our product and your input is of great help.  Kind regards, Johanna Nyström Hostess

column5: Nice enough hotel. Rooms are functional, clean, well laid out, although with few extras. Mine did have a fridge and a small stove, if I'd wanted to cook. Its a bit out of town and on an ugly stretch of road, but an easy enough walk into Lund. They will lend you a bicycle, which…

Had a lovely stay at this hotel. Staff were very kind to me when I came down with a cold. Loved the rooms because they were big and love having a kitchen with a fridge. A few things i would change. Kitchen needs a kettle for tea lovers like myself and sometimes there automated…

Not pretentious self service hotel but with all facilities that you need. All is in order to makes you feel at home. Stuff is very pleasant and helpful. Very good value for money. The perfect Hotel for business trip.

Automated check-in and check-out, a self-service 'kitchen'/cafeteria makes it a little antiseptic, although the staff were helpful when called on for assistance.   A definite lack of atmosphere in the lobby as people hardly stopped there, like me making their way to their rooms.…

New hotel with different, automated, approach. Most of things are automated, you will meet staff only few times a day. If you need something, you have to use phone at the desk. But the staff is very kind and helpful.  I stayed for few days in single room and there was almost…

Bodde på Hotel Finn en natt då vi hade en konferens i Lund. Sov otroligt skönt och jag tyckte att mitt rum var suveränt, kändes nästan som att jag var ”hemma”.  Hade anmält mina allergier med mat och fick både yoghurt och bröd som jag tålde på morgonens frukost – tummen upp!

I loved Hotel Finn. Me, my sister and my three children had a very nice stay in a spacious Studio L. I had to call them to make the reservation because of us being five instead of four, and both the service and the positive attitude where splendid. The only con were them not to…

Hamnade av en slump på hotellet då Grand Hotel i Lund slarvat bort min bokning. Fint, stort och rent rum. Skön säng. Trevlig kille i receptionen. gillade inte att det är obemannat nattetid när jag reser ensam. För att trivas ska man veta om i förväg att det självservice och en…

A new hotel jut 10 mins walk from the city center. The self service concept is great. Spacious clean room with everything i needed. There is no restaurant, just a self service shop like area where you can buy drinks/salads/sandwiches etc. Free wifi.

As others have said this is a new "self service" hotel concept. However there was a very helpful and friendly staff member on duty who helped us check in using the airport type check-in machines. He readily admitted they were having teething problems as they had only recently…

Stayed at the Hotel Finn for 4 nights for a work event.  First problem, not theirs, they didn't have a reservation for me, they handled it just fine.  Gave me a room, no problem and said I could sort it out in the morning.  Well handled!  Rooms were big and cozy.  Hot due to the…

A 10 mn à pied du centre ville (à l'est). C'est un hôtel de chaîne, à la déco très moderne, mais, pour un prix acceptable pour la Suède (en tout cas,celui que nous avons obtenu, soit 790 Sk, 96 € mais le prix peut vite monter à 1090 Sk), nous avons eu droit à une grande…

This is a very new concept for an hotel. When you enter you see 2 terminals who can help you to check in and out. The design of the place is nice and clean. In the rooms there is a lot of IKEA. The bathroom is spotless and very smart with the shower doors that you can put away…

This is a new hotel and it is such a great concept.  I was in Lund visiting my daughter so just had a single room (which was adequate, but not as good as some of the larger rooms sound).  The room was relatively small but perfectly outfitted with IKEA (I imagine), and there was…

This is a new hotel (opened February 2012) and there are a few teething problems, for example the duvet did not quite fit the double bed, but the rooms are like studio apartments with a sofa bed, kitchen area and a big tv at the end of the bed that swivels so that you can watch…
